Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • entityPackage.Entity
      • entityPackage.Sprite
        • entityPackage.GameObject
          • entityPackage.NPC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy

    public class NPC
extends GameObject
    Base NPC Class All the Enemies are based off this class Deals with Pathfinding
    Author:
    watacoso
